whyWorkHere.title: Why Work at Expanse
whyWorkHere.subtitle: At Expanse, we're building the future of hosting with a team of passionate individuals who share our vision. Here's what makes working with us special:

benefits.title: Innovation First
benefits.description: We're constantly pushing the boundaries of what's possible in hosting technology, from hardware to software.

benefits.title: Remote-Friendly
benefits.description: Work from anywhere in the world. We believe great talent shouldn't be limited by geography.

benefits.title: Flexible Hours
benefits.description: We focus on results, not hours. Work when you're most productive and maintain a healthy work-life balance.

benefits.title: Rapid Growth
benefits.description: Join a fast-growing company where you'll have opportunities to take on new challenges and advance your career.

benefits.title: Ownership Culture
benefits.description: Everyone at Expanse has a voice. We encourage ownership, initiative, and the freedom to pursue your ideas.

benefits.title: Cutting-Edge Tech
benefits.description: Work with the latest technologies, including AMD Ryzen 9950X processors, AI automation, and Ceph storage systems.

benefits.title: Continuous Learning
benefits.description: We invest in your growth with learning stipends, conference budgets, and regular knowledge-sharing sessions.

benefits.title: Real Impact
benefits.description: See the direct impact of your work on thousands of customers and millions of end-users around the world.

openRoles.title: Open Roles
openRoles.subtitle: Join our team of explorers and help us build the future of hosting. We're looking for passionate individuals who share our vision and values.

roles.title: Plugin Developer (Ecosystem)
roles.description: Build plugins and tools for Expanse's ecosystem. Project-based collaboration with revenue share and milestone payments. Work on Minecraft plugins, experimental Hytale integrations, and internal tooling.

details.overview: This is a project-based ecosystem role, not a traditional payroll position. You'll collaborate with us on plugins, tools, and integrations that enhance Expanse's hosting platform. Each project is opt-in, and we prioritize long-term partnerships over one-off contracts.
whatYoullBuild: Minecraft server plugins and mods for our hosting platform
Developer tools and APIs that improve the platform experience
Open-source contributions that benefit the broader community
requirements: Show us what you've built — portfolio, GitHub, or live projects matter more than credentials
Experience with plugin development (Minecraft, Bukkit/Spigot/Paper, or similar)
Ability to write clean, documented code that others can maintain
Comfortable working independently and shipping on time
Open to feedback and iteration based on user needs
details.compensation: Project-based compensation with flexible models: revenue share on successful plugins, milestone payments for development phases, or hybrid arrangements. We're open to discussing what works best for each project and contributor.
details.platforms: Primary focus on Minecraft plugins and server tools. Experimental work on Hytale integrations as the platform develops. Opportunities to build internal tooling and developer-facing APIs.

earlyCareers.title: Early Careers
earlyCareers.description: At Expanse, we're passionate about nurturing the next generation of tech talent. Our founder started Expanse while still a CSE and AI/ML student, and we believe in the power of fresh perspectives and innovative thinking.
earlyCareers.subtitle: Whether you're a student, recent graduate, or early in your career, we offer various programs to help you grow and make a real impact in the world of cloud infrastructure.

programs.title: Internship Program
programs.description: Gain real-world experience working alongside our engineering, product, and marketing teams. Open to students and recent graduates.

programs.title: Early Access & Credits
programs.description: Get early access to our latest tools and receive free credits to explore and deploy projects on Expanse infrastructure.

programs.title: Project-Based Collaborations
programs.description: Join us on meaningful, short-term projects around automation, monitoring, and AI — perfect for those looking to contribute and learn without long-term commitment.

programs.title: Learning Programs
programs.description: Access our learning resources, mentorship opportunities, and technical workshops to accelerate your career.
